name: user-api
description: User api to run on AWS Lambda with DynamoDB storage

scripts.local:createUser: npm run build && serverless invoke local -f createUser
scripts.local:getAllUsers: npm run build && serverless invoke local -f getAllUsers
scripts.local:getUser: npm run build && serverless invoke local -f getUser
scripts.local:updateUser: npm run build && serverless invoke local -f updateUser
scripts.local:deleteUser: npm run build && serverless invoke local -f deleteUser

author: Benjamin Stafford
